sent.orig: To Be a small Fish a Big Pond or a Big Fish a Small Pond?
sent.trans: 做小池塘的大鱼还是做大池塘的小鱼？

sent.orig: High dense settling pond is a new settling pond with high efficiency.
sent.trans: 高密度澄清池是一种新型高效的澄清池。

sent.orig: Dilute with pond water and splash into the entire pond evenly.
sent.trans: 用池水稀释全池均匀泼洒。

sent.orig: He called his pond the Free Life Pond.
sent.trans: 他把他的池塘起名为放生池。

sent.orig: The muddy pond changed into a beautiful lotus pond after harnessing.
sent.trans: 经过治理，这片烂泥塘成了漂亮的荷花塘。
